title: Amazing HOME! Great Location! CALL NOW! MUST SEE!!!!
posting_body: Here is your perfect lil home in THE desirable Bagley District!!
This home features 3 nice size bedrooms, 1 full bath updated bathroom with sliding shower door new toilet and sink.....1 half bath in basement.
Updated kitchen complete with new dishwasher double sink granite countertop pretty laminate flooring Gorgeous hardware everywhere.
Brand new carpeting and flooring throughout.
WE ARE OPEN and would love to show you around, please call to schedule your tour!
